name: Spyglass
text: During your attack ability, gain advantage on one attack.

name: Crude Helmet
text: When you are attacked, treat any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws as a %game.attackmodifier.plus1% instead.

name: Traveling Cloak
text: At the start of the scenario increase your maximum hit point value by 1.

name: Crude Hide Armor
text: On the next two attacks targeting you, the attacker gains disadvantage.

name: Crude Boots
text: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move%

name: Flexible Slippers
text: During your end-of-turn looting, loot an adjacent hex instead of the hex you occupy.

name: Crude Bow
text: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to one of your ranged attacks.

name: Crude Spear
text: During your turn, one of your single-target melee attack abilities may target an enemy two hexes away.

name: Protective Scepter
text: During you turn, grant one ally within %game.action.range:2%: %game.action.shield:1%. ^eot^

name: Crude Shield
text: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition

name: Simple Charm
text: At the start of the scenario remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier card from your attack modifier deck.

name: Crude Chain Armor
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attack.

name: Dancing Slippers
text: After you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, perform: %game.action.move% 2

name: Heavy Sword
text: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

name: Reinforced Shield
text: When an enemy would apply a negative condition to you, prevent the condition.

name: Inspiring Helmet
text: During your turn, grant all adjacent allies: %game.action.move% 2

name: Cured Leather Armor
text: On the next two attacks targeting you, the attacker gains disadvantage.

name: Rough Boots
text: During your turn add +1 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities.

name: Ringing Hammer
text: During your attack ability add $wfh-muddle$ to all your attacks.

name: Well Strung Bow
text: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged attacks.

name: Chain Hood
text: While you are adjacent to tree or more enemies, gain %game.action.shield:1%.

name: Heavy Chain Armor
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:3% for the attack.

name: Sturdy Greaves
text: At the start of your turn, add -2 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities to gain %game.action.shield% this round. ^eot^

name: Corrupted Blade
text: During your melee attack ability, add $wfh-wound$, $wfh-poison$, $wfh-muddle$ to one attack.

name: Soothing Scepter
text: During your turn, perform $wfh-regenerate$ ~!%game.action.target% 1 ally, %game.action.range:2%!~

name: Truesight Lenses
text: During your attack ability, treat all negative and %game.attackmodifier.null% modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

name: Cloak of Warding
text: Immediately after an enemy ends its move ability adjacent to you, perform $wfh-push$ 1 ~!%game.action.target% the enemy!~

name: Sturdy Boots
text: During your turn add +1 %game.action.move% to all your move abilities and ignor difficult terrain.

name: Cleaving Axe
text: After your melee attack, one enemy adjacent to the target suffers %game.damage% 2.

name: Parrying Gauntlet
text: Immediately after an enemy ends its move ability adjacent to you, perform %game.action.attack% 3 ~!%game.action.target% the enemy!~

name: Deathproof Charm
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from any source, negate the %game.damage%.

name: Shell Armor
text: During yur turn, perform $wfh-ward$ ~!self!~

name: Volatile Boots
text: Up to once each turn during your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move%, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

name: Shrapnel Bomb
text: After your ranged attack, all enemies adjacent to the target suffer %game.damage% 2.

name: Kite Shield
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack and prevent any negative conditions from the attack.

name: Plumed Helmet
text: When you are attacked by an attack with disadvantage, treat all %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and %game.attackmodifier.plus1% attack modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.minus1%.

name: Ghost Cloak
text: During your turn suffer %game.damage% 3 to perform $invisible$ ~!self!~

name: Duelists Shoes
text: During your turn, perform: %game.action.move% 2 This movement must end adjacent to an enemy.

name: Abyss Axe
text: During your attack ability, add +3 %game.action.attack% and $wfh-pierce$ 1 to one attack targeting a Frozen Corpse, Ice Wraith, or Living Doom.

name: Heartstrike Bow
text: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% and +2 %game.action.range% to one of your ranged attacks.

name: Intricate Charm
text: At the start of the scenario remove one %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and one %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier card from your attack modifier deck.

name: Ornate Armor
text: On the next two sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attacks.

name: Kicking Boots
text: During your melee attack ability, add $wfh-push$ 2 to one attack.

name: Sword of Absolution
text: When you would gain $wfh-poison$ or $wfh-curse$, gain $wfh-bless$ instead.

name: Master Scepter
text: During your turn, perform: %game.action.heal% 1 ~!%game.action.target% 1 ally, %game.action.range:2%, $wfh-ward$!~

name: Double-Lens Goggles
text: During your attack ability, gain advantage on all attacks and treat all %game.attackmodifier.plus0% and %game.attackmodifier.minus1% modifier cards as %game.attackmodifier.plus1% instead.

name: Robes of Doom
text: On the next two sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, suffer %game.damage% 3 to give the attacker $wfh-brittle$.

name: Living Shoes
text: After an ally's heal ability targeting you, perform: %game.action.move% 2

name: Cruel Dagger
text: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and $wfh-wound$ to one attack.

name: Shield of Reciprocity
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack and flip this card over.

name: Spiked Collar
text: During your turn perform $wfh-wound$ ~!self!~

name: Laser Lens
text: During your turn, @wfh-fire-consume@ to cause up to two enemies within %game.action.range:4% to suffer %game.damage% 1.

name: Hobnail Boots
text: After you move 4 or more hexes during your turn, gain %game.action,retaliate% 1 for the round.

name: Restful Slippers
text: During your short rest, instead of randomly losing one card from your discard pile, randomly draw three cards from your discard pile and choose one to lose.

name: Biting Gauntlet
text: When you are attacked by an adjacent enemy, gain %game.action,retaliate% 2 for the attack.

name: Scavenger's Magnet
text: During your turn, @wfh-earth-consume@ to loot one adjacent loot token.

name: Shovel
text: During your turn, destroy one adjacent obstacle, hazardous terrain, difficult terrain, icy terrain, or trap tile.

name: Slippery Sword
text: During your melee attack abiluty, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack. After the ability, gain $wfh-disarm$.

name: Charm of Expertise
text: At the start of the scenario, for the scenario, gain one 1-mark perk from your character sheet which you have not yet gained.

name: Cloak of Many Pockets
text: At the start of the scenario, bring up to two additional %game.items.slots.small% items.

name: Spiked Shell
text: Immediately after you are attacked by an adjacent enemy, that enemy suffers %game.damage% X, where is X is your %game.action.shield% value for the attack.

name: Everlasting Boots
text: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move% and gain $wfh-regenerate$

name: Shadow Stompers
text: During your move ability, @wfh-dark-consume@ add +2 %game.action.move%

name: Detonator
text: When one of your summons is killed, all enemies adjacent to it suffer %game.damage% 2 and gain $wfh-wound$.

name: Rust Powder
text: During your turn, place a character token on one normal or elite enemy within %game.action.range:3%.  That enemy gains -1 %game.action.shield% for the scenario. ^ongoing^

name: Amulet of Eternal Life
text: At the start of your rest, perform: %game.action.heal% 1 ~!self!~

name: Converging Lenses
text: When you are attacked, add +1 %game.action.attack% to attack to instead of drawing an attack modifier card and flip this card over.

name: Scaled Armor
text: On the next three sources of 2 or fewer %game.damage% you would suffer, negate the %game.damage%.

name: Feathered Cloak
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, @wfh-air-consume@ to gain %game.action.shield:3% for the attack.

name: Aesther Robe
text: When you suffer %game.damage% from %game.action,retaliate%, reduce the %game.damage% to 1. If it already 1, reduce it to 0 instead.

name: Bone Boots
text: After your ability where you kill an enemy, perform: %game.action.move% 4

name: Oak Staff
text: During you turn, @wfh-light-consume@ to perform: $wfh-bless$ ~!%game.action.range:3%!~

name: Energizing Baton
text: When you apply a positive condition to an ally, a different ally within %game.action.range:3% gains the same condition.

name: Shock Grenades
text: During your turn, perform $wfh-muddle$ ~!%game.action.range:2%!~ *cone_1_1*

name: Rose Gauntlet
text: After any ally within %game.action.range:2% suffers %game.damage% from an attack, remove all negative conditions from the ally then perform: %game.action.heal% 3 ~!%game.action.target% the ally, $wfh-pull$ 1!~

name: Horn of Command
text: During one of your summons' turns, decide how it peforms it's abilities.

name: Chaos Cannon
text: During you turn, replace one 1-hex obstacle, hazardous terrain, difficult terrain, or icy terrain tile in an unoccupied hex withing %game.action.range:2% with a different type of tile listed above.

text: Once each turn, during your attack ability, gain advantage on one attack, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

name: Roasted Fowl
text: During you turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks and perform: %game.action.heal% 2 ~!self!~

name: Living Stone
text: When you would suffer 4 or fewer %game.damage% from attack, negate the %game.damage% and perform %game.action.heal% X ~!self!~ wheee x is the amount of damage you would have suffered.

name: Pain Simulacrum
text: When you suffer 5 or fewer %game.damage% from an attack, one enemy within %game.action.range:2% also suffers the same amount of %game.damage%.

name: Mechanical Cube
text: During your move ability, after you enter any one hex, give $wfh-immobilize$ to all adjacent enemies.

text: During your turn, perform: %game.action.heal% 3 ~!%game.action.target% 1 ally, %game.action.range:1%!~

text: During your attack ability add $wfh-pierce$ 3 to one attack targeting an enemy whose current hit point value is 4 or less.

name: Sword of Mastery
text: During your melee attack ability, give advantage on one atrack.  For each master you have completed also add one following to the attack: +1 %game.action.attack%, $wfh-wound$, or $wfh-poison$.

name: Tanjo
text: During your turn, add +3 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks performed by Lurkers targeting you this round. ^eot^

name: Boom Barrel
text: During your turn, designate one adjacent hex.  At the end of your turn, all figures withing %game.action.range:2% of the designated hex suffer %game.damage% 1.

name: Elemental Stone
text: After ordering of initiative, choose one element. This element cannot be infused or consume by any monster this round. ^eot^

name: Key of Seasons
text: During your attack ability @wfh-ice-consume@ to add $wfh-immobilize$ to one attack, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

name: Cup of Ventillion
text: During your heal ability add one positive condition you have to one heal.

name: Befuddling Mug
text: During your, add +1 %game.action.attack% and $wfh-muddle$ to all your attacks. At the end of your turn, perform: $wfh-muddle$ ~!self!~

name: Tome of Elements
text: During your turn, @wfh-fire@ @wfh-ice@ @wfh-air@ @wfh-earth@ @wfh-light@ @wfh-dark@ Elements do not move from strong to waning at the end of this round. ^eot^

name: Tome of Time
text: During ordering of initiative after all ability card have been revealed, shuffle all monster ability decks and draw a new card for each active monster set.

name: Tome of Life
text: During your turn, remove all conditions from all figures then grant all figures: %game.action.heal% 2 ~!self!~

name: Tome of Conflict
text: During your turn all figures gain $wfh-strengthen$. Until any monster is killed, the first attack modifier card drawn for every attack is treated as rolling. ^ongoing^

name: Belaras Quill
text: During your turn, %game.card.recover% up to one Tome item.

name: Ice Shiv
text: During your melee attack ability, @wfh-ice-consume@ to add $wfh-pierce$ 3 to one attack.

name: Black Box
text: During yor turn, discard two cards from your hand to perform: %game.action.heal% 6 ~!self!~

name: Lightning Rod
text: After ordering of initiative, all monsters consider you to be first in initiative order when determining focus this round. ^eot^

name: Armor of Empathy
text: After the next three attacks targeting you, flip this card over.

name: Algox Carving
text: During your melee attack ability, @wfh-earth-consume@ to add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack and flip this card over.

name: Unfettered Arm
text: During your attack ability, double the numerical value of the next attack modifier card you draw. %game.attackmodifier.double% and %game.attackmodifier.null% modifier cards are unaffected.

name: Data Drive
text: When you short rest, place half (rounded down) of your discard pile on this item, lose of the remaining cards randomly as normal, then draw the cards on this item.

name: Extendable Pole
text: During your turn, open one unlocked door while withing %game.action.range:2%.

name: Exquisite Map
text: During your turn grant one ally withing %game.action.range:3%: %game.action.move% 3

name: Examination Glass
text: After you draw one loot card, draw one additional card, keep one, and place the other on either the top or bottom of the loot deck.

name: Skinning Knife
text: When you gain a loot token, gain 3 `hide` instead of drawning a loot card.

name: Orchid Wand
text: During your turn lose 1 morale to perform: $wfh-bless$ ~!%game.action.target% all allies and self!~

name: Dead Raven
text: During you ally's ranged attack ability, add $wfh-muddle$ and $wfh-curse$ to one attack.

name: Ooze Vial
text: During your turn, create one $wfh-poison$, $wfh-immobilize$ trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Small Rat
text: During your turn, loot one loot token within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Cracked Mirror
text: During your turn, lose one card from your hand to %game.card.recover% one card from your loot pile of equal of lower level.

name: Mesmerizing Seashell
text: During your turn, choose one of six directions. You and all figures withing %game.action.range:2% are forced to simultaneously move 2 hexes in the chosen directon.

name: Cracked Idol
text: When you would become exhausted from suffering %game.damage%, set your hit point value to 1 instead.

name: Eye of the Storm
text: During your turn, all allies and enemies within %game.action.range:2% suffer %game.damage% 1.

name: Demons Gem
text: When you fail a scenario, still earn all ^checkmark^ from your battle goal if it was completed.

name: Shimmering Powder
text: After you draw one loot card, draw one additional loot card.

name: Lucky Dice
text: During your attack ability, treat the next three attack modifier cards you draw as rolling

name: Cursed Rock
text: This item cannot be sold and must be brought into and used every scenario. At the start of the scenario perform: $wfh-curse$, $wfh-bless$ ~!self!~

name: Ember Energy Source
text: During your turn, increase the printed %game.action.attack%, %game.action.move%, %game.action.target%, or %game.action.range% numerical value on one of your abilities by 1.

name: Trainers Net
text: During your turn, capture an adjacent enemy whose hit point value is 1 or 2.
